#summary Use case for setting client preferences.

= Details =

Actors: Basic User

*Flow of Events*

  # User selects to edit their preferences from a drop-down menu.
  # GUI opens a preferences dialog.
  # User changes their preferences.
  # Client commits preferences to memory and applies any immediately relevant changes.
  # GUI closes preferences dialog.
